name: The World's Women 2020 Data Portal
description: Interactive portal compiling 100 data stories providing a snapshot of the state of gender equality worldwide, analyzing gender equality in six critical areas: population and families; health; education; economic empowerment and asset ownership; power and decision-making; and violence against women and the girl child as well as the impact of COVID-19.
owner_name: United Nations Department of Economic and Social Affairs (UN DESA)
